title: Jets' Hellebuyck pulls off rare Hart-Vezina double
description: Winnipeg's Connor Hellebuyck has won the Hart Trophy as NHL MVP and the Vezina Trophy as the league's best goaltender.
author: Kristen Shilton

title: Agent: Skaggs named Reds' Miley as drug supplier
description: The agent of the late Tyler Skaggs said in a deposition that Skaggs told him he was using pain pills containing oxycodone that were provided by Reds left-hander Wade Miley.

title: 'A gamble for Frank - but Dane has earned Spurs chance'
description: Thomas Frank's move to Spurs is a risk for the charismatic Dane - but he has earned the big opportunity, says chief football writer Phil McNulty.

title: Scheffler and McIlroy off pace at bruising US Open
description: Rory McIlroy and Scottie Scheffler are among many to find Oakmont Country Club a bruising challenge as JJ Spaun sets the pace on day one at the US Open.

title: Frank appointed Tottenham head coach
description: Tottenham have appointed Thomas Frank as their new head coach.

title: Tuchel: My mum thinks Bellingham's behaviour can be repulsive
description: Thomas Tuchel has admitted his own mother thinks Jude Bellingham's on-pitch temperament "can be a bit repulsive", but insists the midfielder is "special".

title: Bella Mir, daughter of former UFC champion, booked for first MMA fight since 2022
description: After three years away from the cage, Bella Mir resumes her journey toward UFC gold.

title: J.J. Spaun leads U.S. Open after day of wild shots and shocking scores
description: J.J. Spaun played a surprisingly steady hand Thursday among a wild mix of rare shots and some shockers at Oakmont, playing bogey-free on Americaâ€™s toughest course for a 4-under 66 and a one-shot lead in the U.S. Open.
